vidis.data.var.vars
Class FieldVariable

java.lang.Object
  vidis.data.var.AVariable
      vidis.data.var.vars.FieldVariable
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVariableChangeProducer
public class FieldVariable
extends AVariable

a field variable; this class uses reflection to get the contents of a field variable in a certain object.

Author:
Dominik
